name: You Vs Sphere Man
description:
You vs Sphere man is a game about.. Well, you fighting sphere man! this is a short game tho, i'm talking like 15? 5? around 10  minutes of game play it's really not that long, if there's any glitches let me know I might fix them, anyways have fun ig ig lol lol

Update: the credits on the win screen are wrong, the plauge in is only used in the scratch version (its not out yet) i'll fix that later.
